name: HSP_TX_NDC_CODES
description: Table for National Drug Code (NDC) codes and related information.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: NDC_CODE_RG_ID
columns.description: Holds medication national drug codes associated with the charge.

columns.name: NDC_CODE_RG_ID_NDC_CODE
columns.description: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.

columns.name: NDC_CODE_ADMIN_AMT
columns.description: Administered amount for associated national drug code.

columns.name: NDC_CODE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the unit associated with National Drug Code administered amount for the hospital billing transaction.
